text: Step 8 left EEHK right v M - 00000 ~——, i 1 def partition(nums, left, right): gy i, j = left, right # Bl nums[left] REEH while i < j: while i < j and nums[j] >= nums[left]l: # MARERENM FEERNTE j-=1 while i < j and nums[i] <= nums[left]: # MEBGREMATFEERNTE i+=1 nums[il, nums[j] = nums[j], nums[i] # XN TR nums[i], nums[left] = nums[left], nums[i] # BEEBZREFFHRANSFE return i # EREEERIERS| wiw.hello-algo. com
